attributes.title: I am offended
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, I was met with D*nald Tr*mp’s face. I was so shocked and violated that I threw my phone across the room and ran to throw up. How dare something so violating exist. If I could I’d rate this something even worse than 1 star. Take this app down immediately!

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: I got this app for my mom, then she was like where is the sun for the cart? I had no choice but to be like, whatever Karen. Anyways, the app was definitely like cooper marathon worthy, wondering when my parrot was gonna swim. So like, refund weather please?

attributes.title: barbs
attributes.review: overall this app is uncooperative and a slow piece of junk. I do not recommend downloading, it is a plain waste of space on your phone. It is laggy and outdated, so if you have any common sense do not download this app.

attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: I wanted to download this app so bad so I could support our orange, racist, sexist, transphobic and homophobic president. I heard he just got out of a peach so yay for him. After less then a week of using the app I was extremely disappointed because it did not work at all!!

attributes.title: terrible food
attributes.review: i ordered my food and it took HOURS! the delivery man was orange and ugly and wouldn’t stop screaming about “fAke nEwS” and the food was TERRIBLE. threw it in the trash immediately! horrible service and i do not recommend to anyone who enjoys actual food! 💀💀💔💔🤮😭🗡🖕🏼😖😖😖😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: Very laggy
attributes.review: So, I went to this app to see Trumps plans for election and all that, but like the app kept crashing and lagging CONSTANTLY! And like my WIFI is 100% great never has problems with it, so the only problem I can find is this app!

attributes.title: GARBAGE
attributes.review: it took abt a entire day to download and glorious tiktok that the poopy government is taking down and if you take it down every kid who could actually be themselves on the app could be and you took that all away from them so 1 star review❤️❤️❤️❤️💕

attributes.title: Stuped
attributes.review: You can’t even get on the app with out your phone crashing when I finally got in it look for ever to lose no joke 1 hour the reason I got it was to see what his plans wher but I chodent even do that like wow

attributes.title: Smh
attributes.review: When I first downloaded it a orange piped off on my screen I was confused but when along with it then kept asking me personal stuff like you rlly think ima give you that stuff hell no and it made my iPad break and kinda upset.

attributes.title: VERY LAGGY
attributes.review: this app was terrible , it kept crashing and had so many glitches. I do not like this because i genuinely want to open the app but it’s terrible , will no longer continue having this app
